mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.nick_name as nickName, a.login_name as loginName, a.img as img, a.description as description, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.del_flag as delFlag
mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.nick_name as nickName, a.description as description, date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.del_flag as delFlag, a.login_name as name, a.img as img from biz_user as a where a.del_flag=0
mapper.update:
update biz_user set
nick_name=#{nickName},
description=#{description},
img=#{img},
update_date=#{updateDate}
where id=#{id} and del_flag=0
update biz_user set del_flag=1 where id=#{id}
